author: Unity
description:
New Technical Industry content: Accelerate your workflow with Unity AI 🚀
This product showcase demonstrates how you can get started with AI in the Unity Editor and achieve functional results in just minutes.

See what's possible:
Generate UI with text prompts
Create assets instantly with AI
Create fully working C# scripts
Connect Unity components like audio, lighting, animation and UI
Go from concept to prototype in minutes

In the video, we transform a simple idea into a functional addition to a chair configurator control system using prompts.

Unity AI can help you build faster, create smarter, and bring your ideas to life. Your next breakthrough is just a prompt away.

Explore Unity industrial applications: https://on.unity.com/4kpptyZ
Start your free Industry trial: http://on.unity.com/4lAhMHg
title: Unity AI for Industry

author: Unity
description:
Imagine having the power to supercharge your prototyping! Learn how you can leverage Unity AI to speed up your prototyping - iterating on your game ideas more efficiently!

Check out this course on Unity Learn: https://unity3d.info/learn-unity-ai 

Time Stamps: 
[0:00] Intro
[0:10] Unity Learn - What to Expect
[0:22] Unity AI Assistant + Generators
[0:53] Get started at Unity Learn: https://unity3d.info/learn-unity-ai
title: Prototype a scene with Unity AI

author: Unity
description:
Alfonso from Lapsus Games, creator of Node: The Last Favor of the Antarii, and 20 year animation industry veteran stops by to show you how you can better light your scenes to instill various emotions in your players!

Check out NODE: The Last Favor of the Antarii on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2757670/NODE_The_Last_Favor_of_the_Antarii/
title: Animation Industry PRO on how to light a scene to convey emotion | Guest Lecturer
